sections.content:
At MetaGo ("MetaGo," "we," "us," or "our"), an entity of Ketto Online Ventures Private Limited, your privacy is our top priority. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, disclose, and protect your personal and health-related information when you interact with our website, mobile applications, clinical programs, and related services (collectively, the "Services").
By accessing or using our Services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with its terms, please do not access or use MetaGo.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.subtitle: We collect the following types of data:
content: a. Personal Identifiable Information (PII)
Full name
Date of birth, age, gender
Phone number, email address, residential address
Government-issued IDs (for verification, if required)
b. Health Information
Medical history, allergies, current conditions
Prescription medications, treatment history
Lab results, diagnostic data, weight, vitals
Responses to health questionnaires and symptom checkers
c. Payment and Transaction Data
Billing address
Payment method (collected and processed by secure third-party payment gateways; we do not store card details directly)
d. Device & Technical Information
IP address
Browser and operating system type
Device identifiers
Access times and pages visited
e. Communication & Support Interactions
Emails, chats, feedback forms, and phone call logs with our support team

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.subtitle: We use your information to:
content: Provide personalized medical and coaching services
Assess eligibility and prescribe appropriate treatment (e.g., GLP‑1 medication)
Coordinate lab testing, medication delivery, and doctor consults
Communicate with you about appointments, dosage reminders, program updates
Improve user experience and enhance service functionality
Ensure compliance with medical regulations and maintain internal records
fulfill legal or regulatory obligations, including public health reporting

sections.title: Legal Basis for Processing (if applicable under GDPR)
sections.subtitle: Where applicable, our processing is justified under the following bases:
content: Your consent
Performance of a contract (program or subscription)
Legal obligations
Legitimate business interests (e.g., service improvement)

sections.title: Who We Share Your Data With
sections.subtitle: We never sell your personal data. We only share it in the following circumstances:
content: Doctors and licensed healthcare providers– to deliver care and make informed clinical decisions
Diagnostic labs and pharmacies– to process tests and medication delivery
Authorized third-party service providers– for cloud hosting, technical support, analytics, and communications (under strict confidentiality agreements)
Legal authorities or regulators– if required to comply with applicable laws
Your consented parties– if you request referrals or data sharing

sections.title: How We Store and Protect Your Information
sections.subtitle: We take privacy and security seriously. Your data is:
content: Encrypted in transit and at rest using industry-standard protocols
Stored on secure servers hosted in India
Access-controlled and protected with strong authentication layers
Regularly audited for security vulnerabilities and compliance
To exercise these rights, email us at info@metago.health
We retain your health and personal data for a minimum of 3 years after your last activity or longer, in accordance with medical record-keeping laws and regulatory requirements.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.subtitle: You have the right to:
content: Access the data we hold about you
Request corrections or updates to your data
Request deletion of your account and associated data (except where legally required to retain)
Withdraw consent for non-essential communications
File a complaint with a data protection authority (if applicable)
To exercise these rights,
email us at info@metago.health

sections.title: Use of Cookies and Tracking Technologies
sections.subtitle: We use cookies and similar technologies to:
content: Enhance site functionality and personalization
Understand user behavior and improve services
Deliver relevant communications and reminders
You may modify cookie preferences in your browser. Blocking cookies may affect certain features.

sections.title: Children's Privacy
sections.content: MetaGo is intended only for users 18 years and older. We do not knowingly collect data from individuals under 18. If we become aware that a minor has submitted personal data, we will delete it promptly.

sections.title: Cross-Border Data Transfers
sections.content: If you access MetaGo from outside India, your data may be transferred and processed in that jurisdiction. By using our Services, you consent to this transfer and processing in accordance with this policy.

sections.title: Third-Party Websites & Services
content: Our website or app may link to external sites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices, terms, or content of third-party services. Please review their policies before engaging.
Policy Updates

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in law, technology, or business practices. The updated version will be posted with the new effective date. If changes are material, we will notify you via email or in-app message.
